description: Unique identifier for a repair action record within the catalog of maintenance or service tasks.
System code for the repair action, used to reference and sequence tasks in procedures and interfaces.
Human-readable name or description of the repair action performed (e.g., Diagnosis, Test Drive).
Indicates whether this action is obsolete/inactive and should not be used for new work orders.
Flags whether this action is the default selection in relevant workflows or templates; likely default option for new tasksâ€”confirm with SME.
